title: On the Poisson Structure of the Time-Dependent Mean-Field Equations for Systems of Bosons out of Equilibrium
abstract: We analyze the Poisson structure of the time-dependent mean-field equations for bosons and construct the Lie-Poisson bracket associated to these equations. The latter follow from the time-dependent variational principle of Balian and Veneroni when a gaussian Ansatz is chosen for the density operator. We perform a stability analysis of both the full and the linearized equations. We also search for the canonically conjugate variables. In certain cases, the evolution equations can indeed be cast in a Hamiltonian form.
